New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 runs off 26 balls, the highest score in the match.
Virat Kohli scored 59 runs, contributing significantly to India's total.
Key Match Events: India reached 50 runs in 6.5 overs and 100 runs in 13.3 overs during their innings.
Hong Kong reached 50 runs in 5.5 overs and 100 runs in 14.3 overs during their innings.
The match was the 1754th T20I match, a significant milestone.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
Hong Kong elected to field first in the toss.
